twilioText.description: Type containing only plain text-based content

twilioMedia.description: twilio/media is used to send file attachments, or to send long text via MMS in the US and Canada. As such, the twilio/media type must contain at least ONE of text or media content.

twilioLocation.description: twilio/location type contains a location pin and an optional label, which can be used to enhance delivery notifications or connect recipients to physical experiences you offer.

twilioListPicker.description: twilio/list-picker includes a menu of up to 10 options, which offers a simple way for users to make a selection.

twilioCallToAction.description: twilio/call-to-action buttons let recipients tap to trigger actions such as launching a website or making a phone call.

twilioQuickReply.description: twilio/quick-reply templates let recipients tap, rather than type, to respond to the message.

twilioCard.description: twilio/card is a structured template which can be used to send a series of related information. It must include a title and at least one additional field.

whatsappCard.description: whatsapp/card is a structured template which can be used to send a series of related information. It must include a body and at least one additional field.

whatsappAuthentication.description: whatsApp/authentication templates let companies deliver WA approved one-time-password button.

twilioCatalog.description: twilio/catalog type lets recipients view list of catalog products, ask questions about products, order products.

twilioCarousel.description: twilio/carousel templates allow you to send a single text message accompanied by a set of up to 10 carousel cards in a horizontally scrollable view

twilioSchedule.description: twilio/schedule templates allow us to send a message with a schedule with different time slots

whatsappFlows.description: whatsapp/flows templates allow you to send multiple messages in a set order with text or select options

twilioFlows.description: twilio/flows templates allow you to send multiple messages in a set order with text or select options

whatsapp.description: Contains the whatsapp approval information for the Content resource, with fields such as approval status, rejection reason, and category, amongst others.

url.description: The URL of the resource, relative to `https://content.twilio.com`.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT that the resource was created specified in [RFC 2822](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2822.txt) format.

language.description: Two-letter (ISO 639-1) language code (e.g., en) identifying the language the Content resource is in.

variables.description: Defines the default placeholder values for variables included in the Content resource. e.g. {"1": "Customer_Name"}.

legacy_template_name.description: The string name of the legacy content template associated with this Content resource, unique across all template names for its account.  Only lowercase letters, numbers and underscores are allowed

legacy_body.description: The string body field of the legacy content template associated with this Content resource

get.description: Retrieve a list of Contents belonging to the account used to make the request

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
